regular_rod.description: Just a regular fishing rod made from softwood. Its your first rod so don't expect anything special.
regular_rod.use:
Will allow you to start fishing for **COMMON** fish!
Just use `/fish` to fish, the highest available rod will be used.
regular_rod.buy_message: You can now start fishing for **COMMON** fish. Try using `/fish` c:

hardwood_rod.description: A slightly more enhanced version of the Regular Rod but made from stronger wood! Its able to withstand the pull of even beefier fish.
hardwood_rod.use:
Will allow you to start fishing for **UNCOMMON** fish!
Just use `/fish` to fish, the highest available rod will be used.
hardwood_rod.buy_message: You can now start fishing for **UNCOMMON** fish.

earthworm_bait.description: Just a regular worm put on a hook. Won't do crazy things but still better than nothing.
earthworm_bait.use: Will give you a slightly higher chance to encounter higher-rarity fish. Only properly works if your rod is able to fish for anything more than common.
